participant_1.background:
I am a family-oriented person who likes to drive a minivan because it is roomy and comfortable.
I am fortunate to have a job that allows me to be there for my family.
i have a bicycle.
I am close to my family
I remember the warmth of the other orphans when we huddled together for warmth at night.

participant_2.background:
My family is supportive and understanding, even though they don't know about my love life.
i have 4 dogs.
I'm not really one for relationships, but my dog has been with me for 10 years.
I enjoy listening to the blues while wearing my hunter green suit.
I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings.

content.text: What's up? I'm a family-oriented person who likes to drive a minivan.
Nice, I'm not really one for relationships, but my dog has been with me for 10 years.
Aww, that's cute. I have a bicycle and a minivan
What do you like to do for fun? I enjoy listening to the blues while wearing my hunter green suit.
I like watching movies and listening to music. I also like to go camping and hiking.
Camping sounds fun, I've never been. I don't really like the outdoors.
That's okay, I have a friend who hates the outdoors too.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to cook and bake. I'm also a big fan of Halloween and weddings.
Halloween is my favorite holiday! I love dressing up and going to parties.
Me too! I always go all out for Halloween.
I think I'm going to dress up as a zombie this year.
That's a good idea! I'm thinking about dressing up as a witch.
Yeah, I'm going to have to start working on my costume soon.
Me too. We should get together and work on our costumes together.
Great! We can exchange numbers and set up a time to meet.
